title: Voicy wants to pwn gamers with audio memes
content: It’s not hard to predict where this idea goes: Straight to gross out fart sfx and pwning troll clips — which are indeed plentiful on this fledgling platform for user-generated (or, well, sampled) audio. Dank audio memes anyone?

title: For better or for worse: Managing founder-CEO tension inside a startup
content: This was the first of many memorable interactions I had with Eliot Horowitz. Eliot was the founder and CTO of MongoDB, and in late 2010, I was interviewing to come aboard as president.

title: Turn your shares into your dreams.
content: You don't have to wait for a broker to find someone to buy your shares. No negotiating price. No broker's commission. You only need to decide if you like Linqto's price.
